levels.description:
The next attack deals an additional instance of Arts damage equal to <@ba.vup>{atk_scale_2:0%}</> ATK
<$ba.charged>Charged</> effect: The next attack deals <@ba.vup>{judge_s_1_enhance_checker.atk_scale:0%}</> damage and Stuns the target for <@ba.vup>{stun}</> seconds
